EmailTemplate.description: April 1st Overdue Payment Parts Booking French
EmailTemplate.name: April 1st Overdue Payment Parts Booking French
EmailTemplate.subject: Compte de commande de booking en souffrance pour XXXXXXXX
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello XXXXXXX,
This email is a friendly reminder that payment on your parts booking account with us appears past due in the amount of $XXXXX
Please be advised that late fees may be applied on balances outstanding past the 30th of the month.
If your payment has already been mailed, please accept our thanks and disregard this reminder.
Thank you and have a great day.
